text: Paul Lukas (born Pál Lukács; May 26, 1894 – August 15, 1971) was a Hungarian actor. He won the Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in Watch on the Rhine (1943). ==Other websites== * * * Paul Lukas at Virtual History Category:Academy Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:1894 births Category:1971 deaths Category:Hungarian movie actors Category:Hungarian television actors Category:Hungarian stage actors Category:Actors from Budapest
title: Paul Lukas
